business.headline: Reliance AGM 2025: Will Mukesh Ambani announce Jio IPO?The main talking point at the Reliance AGM will be information about the much-awaited initial public offerings (IPOs) of Jio Platforms and Reliance Retail finally get a timeline.

Sanjeev Sanyal hints at major overhaul in EPFO with 3.0 rolloutEconomist Sanjeev Sanyal has signalled that the Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) is gearing up for a major transformation, with the much-awaited EPFO 3.0 promising faster, simpler, and more digital-first services.

Trump's draconian tariffs may cost India $55-60 billion, warns Jefferies' Chris WoodChris Wood argues that the US tariffs are as much political as economic. He links the steep duties to Donald Trump's "personal pique" at being denied a role in resolving India-Pakistan tensions after their four-day conflict in May.

Cash-rich but time-poor? Why real wealth is about balance, explains CAIn today's fast-paced world, people often chase bigger salaries and titles, but an expert says money alone cannot define wealth. What matters more, he argues, is the freedom to spend time on things that truly count.

Will 50% US tariffs hit India's economic growth in Q1 and beyond?US tariffs, slow private investment, and weak urban demand are testing India's growth. Can GST cuts, government spending, and a strong monsoon keep the economy from stalling?

Reliance AGM today: 5 things you need to knowAll eyes will be on Reliance Industries as it holds its 48th AGM today at 2 PM. From Jio and retail IPO buzz to its push into green energy and AI, investors are bracing for big announcements from Mukesh Ambani.

Former RBI governor Urjit Patel appointed IMF executive directorUrjit Patel succeeds K. Subramanian and will represent India, along with neighbouring countries including Bangladesh, Bhutan, and Sri Lanka, at the Washington-based global financial institution.

Sensex, Nifty open higher after two-day sell-off amid US tariff jittersAt 9:22 am, the S&P BSE Sensex rose 112 points to 80,193.25, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 45 points to 24,545.90. Broader markets also edged higher as volatility eased slightly.

IndiGo gets another six-month extension to lease Turkish Airlines planesThe extension will help IndiGo cut losses caused by geopolitical restrictions, the airline said, referring to an airspace ban imposed by Pakistan on Indian airlines earlier this year that has led to longer routes and higher costs.

India to boost Russian oil imports in September despite US pressure: ReportIndia has become Russia's biggest oil customer since Western sanctions forced Moscow to redirect supplies in 2022. Cheaper Russian crude has helped Indian refiners keep costs down, but the trade has also attracted criticism.

India extends duty-free cotton imports to shield textile sector from US tariffsFor mills, the duty-free extension offers much-needed relief. The earlier exemption, ending in September, was too short to allow large imports, as shipments from exporting nations often take more than a month.

CIBIL Decoded: How delayed credit score updates can hit your loans and ratesA delay of even a few weeks in updating information with the credit bureau can decide whether a person gets a loan, how much interest they pay, or if they are denied altogether.

entertainment.headline: Anthony Ippolito to portray young Sylvester Stallone in biopic I Play RockyActor Anthony Ippolito is set to take on the role of young Sylvester Stallone in 'I Play Rocky'. The film reveals the true underdog story behind the making of the iconic 'Rocky' movie and Stallone's relentless pursuit of his dream.

Param Sundari X reviews: Sidharth-Janhvi shine in a film with weak second halfActors Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor's 'Param Sundari' opens to mixed reactions. Audiences praise the chemistry, but criticise the predictable second half.

Bigg Boss 19: Gauahar reacts after Amaal says Awez-Nagma get work because of himBigg Boss 19 heats up as Amaal Mallik accuses Awez Darbar and Nagma Mirajkar of taking no stand inside the house. Gauahar Khan defends the couple.

Parag Tyagi marks Ganesh Chaturthi in Shefali Jariwala's memory, fulfills her wishParag Tyagi celebrated Ganesh Chaturthi in memory of Shefali Jariwala. He shared a video along with a heartfelt note while remembering his wife.

Bosco Martis demands equal credit for choreographers after Chuttamalle's successChoreographer Bosco Martis has voiced his concerns about inadequate recognition for his work on the hit song 'Chuttamalle' from the Telugu film Devara Part 1.  He called for equal respect and visibility for choreographers alongside stars and music directors in the Indian film industry.

Linkin Park and Playboi Carti to headline Lollapalooza India 2026Lollapalooza India 2026 has announced a historic line-up with Linkin Park set to perform in the country for the first time, alongside headliner Playboi Carti. The Mumbai festival has been scheduled for January 24–25, 2026.

Songs of Paradise review: Saba delivers, Soni Razdan adds soul to Kashmiri sagaRelease Date:Fri Aug 29, 2025'Songs of Paradise' review: Prime Video's latest offering, 'Songs of Paradise', beautifully blends Kashmir's breathtaking landscapes with its rich musical heritage, tracing the inspiring journey of Noor Begum, a woman who defied patriarchy through her voice. Anchored by powerful performances and soulful music, the film is a poignant ode to resilience and art.

Sunny Sanskari Ki Tulsi Kumari teaser: Varun-Janhvi bring love, laughter with twistsThe teaser for Varun Dhawan and Janhvi Kapoor's rom-com 'Sunny Sanskari Ki Tulsi Kumari' has been unveiled, promising a festive wedding twist. Directed by Shashank Khaitan, the film will be released in theatres on October 2.

Bugonia trailer: Emma Stone goes bald in Yorgos' sci-fi dark comedyEmma Stone reunites with Yorgos Lanthimos for the sci-fi black comedy 'Bugonia', where she plays a CEO kidnapped by men who believe she's an alien. The trailer, featuring her bold bald look, has gone viral ahead of the film's October release.

Kpop Demon Hunters' Arden Cho wants to collaborate with BTS, BLACKPINK: ExclusiveNetflix's 'KPop Demon Hunters' has captured global audiences with its hit song 'Golden' becoming the top-streamed track. Actor Arden Cho discussed her role, Asian-American representation, and hoped for a sequel in an exclusive interview.

Farah Khan unveils Aunty Kisko Bola teaser, Sajid-Ssunita join as judgesFarah Khan has launched a quirky YouTube talent show titled 'Aunty Kisko Bola', dedicated to showcasing women's talents regardless of age. The show will feature rotating guest judges, starting with Sajid Khan and Ssunita Ahuja.

Taylor Swift, Travis Kelce enjoy college football in 1st outing after engagementTaylor Swift and Travis Kelce made their first public appearance after announcing their engagement. Several viral pictures and videos showed the singer flaunting her sparkling diamond ring.

Govinda, Ssunita dance together at Ganesh Visarjan amid divorce rumours. VideosActor Govinda and his wife Ssunita Ahuja ended divorce rumours by celebrating Ganesh Chaturthi with their family, performing the visarjan rituals with son Yashvardhan. Ssunita also addressed the media, firmly dismissing the speculation and reaffirming their bond.

Salman Khan dances to dhol at Ganpati visarjan, Sonakshi-Zaheer join. WatchSalman Khan participated in Ganpati visarjan by shaking a leg at the grand festivities, which were held by his sister, Arpita Khan Sharma. A video of the superstar dancing to dhol has emerged online.

The Thursday Murder Club review: Immersive whodunnit defying ageing stereotypesRelease Date:Thu Aug 28, 2025The Thursday Murder Club review: 'The Thursday Murder Club', a classic whodunnit blended with humour, is about veteran sleuths investigating unsolved mysteries. The film is an homage to Agatha Christie and Alfred Hitchcock. Is the mystery-comedy worth your time? Here is our review.

Ranveer Singh lights up Ganpati bash as he dances to Deva Shree Ganesha songRanveer Singh danced to 'Deva Shree Ganesha' song at the Ganpati festivities at Ambani residence, Antilia. Deepika Padukone accompanied him to the event.

Ariana Grande announces 2026 Eternal Sunshine tour after seven yearsAriana Grande returns with The Eternal Sunshine Tour in 2026, her first in seven years, featuring US and London shows, blending her music career with Hollywood success after Wicked.

Radio legend Gary Burbank, longtime WLW host, dies at 84 after illnessRadio legend Gary Burbank, famed WLW host and creator of colorful comedy characters, died at 84 after a long illness. He left a legacy in broadcasting, music, and philanthropy.

Nila Madhab Panda's Spying Stars to compete at Busan International Film Festival'Spying Stars' is the only Indian co-production competing in the Busan International Film Festival's new competitive section. The film's themes of AI and humanity highlight a timely cinematic exploration amid changing festival formats.

general news.headline: Rahul Gandhi must apologise: Amit Shah on abuse to PM, his mother at Bihar RallyAmit Shah condemned Congress leaders for allegedly using derogatory words against PM Modi and his late mother during a Bihar rally, calling it the "greatest fall in politics."

World not only watching but counting on India: PM Modi in Tokyo  Live UpdatesThe two sides will go beyond signing MoUs, with Prime Minister Modi and his Japanese counterpart expected to deliberate on the prevailing geopolitical and geo-economic landscape amid US President Donald Trump's ongoing trade war, Indian envoy to Japan Sibi George said.

Trump's 'pique' behind singling out India on tariffs? US report's big claimThe report by Jefferies said Trump's 'personal pique' saw the US impose a 50% tariff on India, the highest among American trading partners.

Asia Cup 2025: India likely to play without jersey sponsor, say sourcesIndia are likely to play without any jersey sponsor in the Asia Cup 2025, sources have confirmed to India Today. During the BCCI emergency Apex council meeting, there were discussions about bringing in the new sponsor. But since there is not enough time to advertise and complete the process, it is going to be a tough task for the board.

How a poor Persian oilman's son rose to rule Kohinoor's nest in IndiaThe rock that Taylor Swift flaunted after her engagement brought India's Golconda diamond mines into focus. The Koh-i-Noor, the world's most famous and costliest diamond, was from India's Golconda mines, and was looted and taken to Persia by invader Nadir Shah. About 150 years before that, a Persian oilman's son, Mir Jumla, who helped Aurangzeb in his succession battle, came to rule the Golconda mines, the nest of the Kohinoor.

Over 170 flights hit as rain pounds Delhi-NCR, big jams as roads waterloggedHeavy traffic congestion was reported across several key routes in the capital following a spell of rain. Major stretches, including the DND Flyway, Mathura Road, Vikas Marg, ISBT, Geeta Colony and Rajaram Kohli Marg experienced slow-moving traffic.

Battle of Patna ft flagpoles: Congress, BJP workers get into street-fightBoth parties accused each other of instigating the clash. BJP workers told India Today TV that they were holding a peaceful protest in front of the Congress office in Patna before people allegedly started pelting stones. On the other hand, Congress accused BJP workers of throwing stones from outside.

What is Daruma Doll to be gifted to PM Modi, what's its significance?During his two-day visit to Japan for the India-Japan Annual Summit, Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be presented with a Daruma doll by the chief priest of Shorinzan-Daruma-ji Temple. The Daruma doll is a hollow, round, brightly painted figure with blank white eyes. It symbolises perseverance, resilience, good fortune, and the pursuit of goals.

Trump's gold fixation brings Midas curse to the White HouseDonald Trump has brought the golden flashiness of his Trump Towers to the White House, changing its look and feel. The whole world now knows about Trump's gold obsession and Apple's Tim Cook has even "bribed" him with a golden plaque. This is how the Midas curse is bringing a golden murkiness to the White House.

Rupee falls to all-time low of 87.97 amid US tariff concernsA weaker rupee against the yuan could offer a partial cushion for exporters hit by US tariffs, making Indian products relatively cheaper compared to Chinese rivals. It could also help narrow India's trade deficit with China.

Video: Punjab ministers discuss Sweden, Goa cruise trips during flood inspectionA leaked Facebook Live showing three Punjab ministers recalling cruises and beach trips during a flood survey in Tarn Taran has triggered outrage, with Congress accusing the AAP government of insensitivity amid the flood alert.

Xi's secret letter spurred Delhi-Beijing thaw during Trump's tariff war: ReportIn his letter to President Droupadi Murmu, later passed on to PM Modi, Chinese President Xi Jinping sought to "test the waters on improving ties." Indian officials said Xi reached out directly to Indian President Droupadi Murmu in March, during heightened US trade tensions with China.

Param Sundari X reviews: Sidharth-Janhvi shine in a film with weak second halfActors Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor's 'Param Sundari' opens to mixed reactions. Audiences praise the chemistry, but criticise the predictable second half.

Pregnant Bengaluru techie found hanging at home, family alleges dowry harassmentThe victim, Shilpa, who had previously worked with IT giant Infosys, had been married to Praveen for about two-and-a-half years. The couple has a one-and-a-half-year-old child.

Is America shutting out Indian students with Trump's new visa restrictions?The Trump administration's proposed student visa restrictions are set to replace flexible stays with fixed terms, sparking anxiety amongst international students. For Indian aspirants, the largest foreign student group in the US, this shift raises questions about affordability, certainty, and future opportunities.

Why India playing Pakistan in cricket no longer fills me with hopeCricket once united India and Pakistan with shared passion, but terror, hostility, and politics have drained its joy. Today, contests feel driven more by commerce than by hope or healing.

How to recognise a panic attack in public, and help someone through itAt a time when cases of anxiety and panic attacks are on the rise, it's important to know how to support someone in distress. Here's a quick guide.

Trump's draconian tariffs may cost India $55-60 billion, warns Jefferies' Chris WoodChris Wood argues that the US tariffs are as much political as economic. He links the steep duties to Donald Trump's "personal pique" at being denied a role in resolving India-Pakistan tensions after their four-day conflict in May.

Donald Trump in incredible shape, but...: JD Vance on replacing US PresidentAt 79, Donald Trump is facing renewed scrutiny over his health after repeated bruising episodes, but Vice President JD Vance insisted that the US President is in good shape.

Songs of Paradise review: Saba delivers, Soni Razdan adds soul to Kashmiri sagaRelease Date:Fri Aug 29, 2025'Songs of Paradise' review: Prime Video's latest offering, 'Songs of Paradise', beautifully blends Kashmir's breathtaking landscapes with its rich musical heritage, tracing the inspiring journey of Noor Begum, a woman who defied patriarchy through her voice. Anchored by powerful performances and soulful music, the film is a poignant ode to resilience and art.

The film is an homage to Agatha Christie and Alfred Hitchcock. Is the mystery-comedy worth your time? Here is our review.

Meet Amit Kapur, the TCS veteran now leading its new AI unit after 1,200 layoffsAfter laying off thousands of employees, TCS has launched a new AI division. According to the recent memo, Amit Kapur, a long-serving TCS executive, will lead the team.

Will 50% US tariffs hit India's economic growth in Q1 and beyond?US tariffs, slow private investment, and weak urban demand are testing India's growth. Can GST cuts, government spending, and a strong monsoon keep the economy from stalling?

Cloudbursts in Uttarakhand's Chamoli and Rudraprayag districts, 8 missingA cloudburst in Uttarakhand's Rudraprayag and Chamoli districts triggered flash floods, collapsing houses and bridges, leaving families trapped and livestock buried.

sports.headline: Novak Djokovic, Carlos Alcaraz headline high-octane third-round actionUS Open 2025, August 29: Day six of the tournament promises high-octane action as third-round matches feature some of the sport's biggest stars. World No. 2 Carlos Alcaraz will take on Italy's Luciano Darderi, while Novak Djokovic returns to Centre Court to face Cameron Norrie.

Unseen video of Harbhajan slapping Sreesanth out; Lalit Modi's clip goes viralFormer IPL chairman Lalit Modi has released the long-hidden clip of Harbhajan Singh slapping Sreesanth during an IPL match in 2008. The footage has gone viral ever since it played on Michael Clarke's podcast.

Asia Cup 2025: India likely to play without jersey sponsor, say sourcesIndia are likely to play without any jersey sponsor in the Asia Cup 2025, sources have confirmed to India Today. During the BCCI emergency Apex council meeting, there were discussions about bringing in the new sponsor. But since there is not enough time to advertise and complete the process, it is going to be a tough task for the board.

WWE Raw implements bold time shift to challenge NFL primetime viewershipWWE Raw teams with Netflix for a bold September test run, starting at 7 p.m. ET to get ahead of Monday Night Football's prime time surge.

BGMI Showdown 2025 announced by Krafton India; winner to secure PMGC 2025 spotBGMI Showdown 2025, teased by Krafton India, will be the company's third official tournament in the country with a huge prize pool. The winning team will advance to PMGC.

Duleep Trophy: Shami fails to impress on first class return, leaks 100 runs in 23 oversIndia fast bowler Mohammed Shami had a forgettable return to red-ball cricket as he leaked 100 runs in 23 overs, playing for East Zone vs North Zone in the Duleep Trophy quarter-final.

Riot Games launches Leagues Disrupt Festival with NLC 2025 finals in StockholmRiot Games is launching Leagues Disrupt, a new esports and gaming festival in Stockholm. The event will feature the NLC 2025 finals and a wide range of entertainment, boosting esports culture in the Nordics.

Sindhu reveals mantra for World Championships after stunning win: Not much to proveTwo-time Olympic medallist PV Sindhu revealed her mantra for the World Badminton Championships after stunning world number two Wang Zhi Yi of China to storm into the quarter-finals on Thursday.

US Open: Tsitsipas' father warned for coaching from sidelines during 2nd round clashStefanos Tsitsipas' father, Apostolos Tsitsipas, was warned for coaching his son from the sidelines during the second round match of the US Open 2025 against Daniel Altmaier.

Lyles and Alfred dominate Diamond League Final in ZurichAmerican sprinter Noah Lyles became the first track athlete to win six Diamond League Final titles by defeating Botswana's Letsile Tebogo in the 200 metres, while St Lucia's Julien Alfred put injury concerns behind her with a commanding victory in the women's 100m.

US Open: Altmaier stuns Tsitsipas; De Minaur, Anisimova ease into Round 3US Open 2025: Stefanos Tsitsipas crashed out after losing to Germany's Daniel Altmaier in a gripping five-set second-round match. Meanwhile, Amanda Anisimova and Alex de Minaur cruised into the third round with convincing straight-set victories.

Riot Games launches Leagues Disrupt Festival with NLC 2025 finals in StockholmRiot Games is launching Leagues Disrupt, a new esports and gaming festival in Stockholm. The event will feature the NLC 2025 finals and a wide range of entertainment, boosting esports culture in the Nordics.

Sindhu reveals mantra for World Championships after stunning win: Not much to proveTwo-time Olympic medallist PV Sindhu revealed her mantra for the World Badminton Championships after stunning world number two Wang Zhi Yi of China to storm into the quarter-finals on Thursday.

US Open: Tsitsipas' father warned for coaching from sidelines during 2nd round clashStefanos Tsitsipas' father, Apostolos Tsitsipas, was warned for coaching his son from the sidelines during the second round match of the US Open 2025 against Daniel Altmaier.

Lyles and Alfred dominate Diamond League Final in ZurichAmerican sprinter Noah Lyles became the first track athlete to win six Diamond League Final titles by defeating Botswana's Letsile Tebogo in the 200 metres, while St Lucia's Julien Alfred put injury concerns behind her with a commanding victory in the women's 100m.

Meanwhile, Amanda Anisimova and Alex de Minaur cruised into the third round with convincing straight-set victories.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
